name: The Pipe Works
description: This is a place where goblins break things on purpose. Mistakes are expected. Traces are kept. Nothing here is neutral.

spawn.name: The Pavement
spawn.description: The pavement is cracked and worn smooth by years of trade.  A faint smell of oil hangs in the air, mingling with the earthy scent of wood dust. A low hum vibrates from somewhere deep within the workshop.

the_pipe_works.name: The Pipe Works
the_pipe_works.description: Copper pipes snake across the floor, some dripping with a mixture of grease and grime. The air is thick with the smell of solder and burning oil.  A cacophony of haggling and clanging metal fills your ears as you stand at the front door, surrounded by a chaotic symphony of activity.
